messages.title: A real voice for Eastleigh in Parliament
messages.content: MIKE THORNTON is the strong local MP we need to stand up to the Conservative Government and provide an effective opposition. Mike is fighting for YOU on the issues that matter most.

messages.title: Young and Old Let Down
messages.content: The Conservatives have revealed their true colours in their election manifesto.

messages.title: 3 things to remember
messages.content: 1. Mike Thornton has ten years’ experience standing up for Eastleigh. 2. The Conservatives have broken their promises to Eastleigh. 3. Labour have already lost the election nationally and have no chance locally. The Liberal Democrats are the only effective opposition.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will commit funding to protect our precious National Health Service and improve social care.
The Liberal Democrats have a carefully costed plan that will support our children's future and reverse Conservative school cuts.
The Conservative candidate pledged to get Eastleigh and Botley's bypasses funded within 100 days. After 100 weeks, nothing.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour have already lost the election nationally and have no chance locally. The Liberal Democrats are the only effective opposition to hold the Conservatives to account.

issues.education: The Liberal Democrats have a carefully costed plan that will support our children's future and reverse Conservative school cuts.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will commit funding to protect our precious National Health Service and improve social care.
issues.transport: The Conservative candidate pledged to get Eastleigh and Botley's bypasses funded within 100 days. After 100 weeks, nothing.
issues.socialWelfare: The Conservatives revealed: End to pension guarantee brought in by the Lib Dems, End to free school dinners for infants, New social care Dementia Tax, No way for tax breaks for big business.

community.content: The Conservative candidate pledged to get Eastleigh and Botley's bypasses funded within 100 days. After 100 weeks, nothing. An empty chair at planning appeals failing to protect our countryside.

leaflet.personalStatement: Mike Thornton has lived here for 25 years and brought up his family here. Eastleigh is home for Mike. It’s time to get an independent real voice for Eastleigh in Parliament.

politicalExperience.achievements: Ten years' experience standing up for Eastleigh

quotes.text: Chancellor promises more jobs and funding.

images.caption: Local champion Mike Thornton has a record of delivering for Eastleigh.
